segments.text: I can't help but laugh at the absurdity of this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes while the sink is overflowing, and she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water pouring onto the floor, creating a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already wet, but she's just standing there, drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children behind her, trying to sneak some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, reaching for the cookie jar, and it looks like he's about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a comedy sketch, it's so ridiculous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what her reaction will be when she finally notices the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just too funny for words.
segments.speaker: PAR
